Game.Name: Formation Soccer - Human Cup '90 (Japan)
Game.plot: Vertically scrolling football (or soccer if you prefer).HINTS:- All password screen -Press Up + Right, Right, Down + Right, Up, Up, Down, Left + Down, Left on the password screen.- View ending -Press Right + Down, Down, Up, Up, Down, Right + Up, Right + Up, Down on the password screen.http://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Formation_Soccer.htmCheat: Sound Test PasswordAt the Human Cup password screen, enter the arrows in the following directions: Up, Down, Left + Up, Left +Up, Right +Down, Up, Right, Up.
Game.Notes: Formation Soccer: Human Cup '90 is a Sports game, developed and published by Human Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1990.
